bug.author: somewacko
bug.summary: Old releases are being deleted from PyPI
bug.description: It appears that old versions of this package are being deleted from PyPI. We have a server build which uses netron as a dependency but it will occasionally break because the version of netron that we pinned no longer exists. Is there a reason that old versions are being deleted? We've been using this tool to visualize TFLite and the Python module is convenient. Thanks!

comments.comment: The goal is to eliminate suppport cost for outdated versions and maximize users participating in stabilizing the latest version.
